title: Icarus but i removed the last part

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make someone soar every night, roleblocking them, and attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you make a Fallen Angel soar, you will also roleblock all of their visitors, and make your target's target soar too.
- If you make a non Fallen Angel soar you will bypass immunities and healing.
**Sin of Vainglory** -- If you're the last Fallen Angel remaining, you can use your ability twice, and your ability will act as if you've targetted a Fallen Angel.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to crush all who oppose the Fallen Angels.
